citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:00 PM on
23-Feb-18.
* Inspector knocked on the front door of the licensee’s house. Inspector then called telephone number given by the
licensee. Inspector waited for 1 hour for licensee to show up to do a facility inspection.
* Copy of inspection report was sent by regular mail.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:00 PM on
23-Feb-18.
* Inspector knocked on the front door of the licensee’s house.  Inspector then called telephone number given by the
licensee.   Inspector waited for 1 hour for licensee to show up to do a facility inspection.
*  Copy of inspection report was sent by regular mail.
